DataElement.preferredName: Radiation Therapy Complete Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria  Code Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The coded response to determine eligibility for clinical trial participation related to completeing radiation therapy as outlined in the study protocol.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Radiation Therapy Complete Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Treatment of a disease by means of exposure of the target or the whole body to radiation. Radiation therapy is often used as part of curative therapy and occasionally as a component of palliative treatment for cancer. Other uses include total body irradiation prior to transplantation._To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: use PHOTOTHERAPY, LASER THERAPY, or ULTRAVIOLET THERAPY for therapeutic radiation with visible, laser, or ultraviolet light, respectively.

Concepts.definition: Treatment of a disease by means of exposure of the target or the whole body to radiation. Radiation therapy is often used as part of curative therapy and occasionally as a component of palliative treatment for cancer. Other uses include total body irradiation prior to transplantation.

Property.preferredDefinition: To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created to support Theradex design of CRFs for NCI CCR trials

ReferenceDocuments.name: Has radiation therapy been co
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has radiation therapy been completed at least 1 week prior to starting treatment and all radiation-related toxicity resolved to less than grade 2?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Was prior radiation completed greater than or equal to 4 weeks prior to study treatment initiation?
